question:
If m pencils cost the same as n pens, and each pencil costs 20 cents, what is the cost, in dollars, of 10 pens, if each pen costs the same amount? (100 cents = 1 dollar)
(A) \(\frac{200n}{m}\)
(B) \(\frac{2n}{100m}\)
(C) \(\frac{2m}{n}\)
(D) \(\frac{2n}{m}\)
(E) \(200mn\)
Show
